attributes.action: Add on to the animal welfare act
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to come into parliament for debate and if possible come into law. I would like to protect animals from mass amounts of cruelty taking place at one establishment. I am intentionally directing this at businesses that take money or donations for the viewing of animals not farms or agriculture. I think this would also help businesses as public reports would leave no room for speculation regarding the way they’re treating their animals.
attributes.background:
To whom it may concern,
 
I would like to create a type of add on the animal welfare law. This would help protect businesses  and animal welfare alike. I have worked hard to raise awareness for this and would like to have it put into effect.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government or Parliament to make to existing animal welfare legislation.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
